one_sentence_purpose: A Terraform provider for managing Google Forms, Sheets, and Drive resources as declarative infrastructure with typed HCL and escape-hatch batch update support.
target_users: DevOps and platform engineers who manage Google Workspace forms and spreadsheets programmatically via Terraform
visual_metaphors: form fields morphing into infrastructure blocks
a pipeline flowing from HCL code into form checkboxes and spreadsheet cells
stacked document layers connected by configuration wires
